name: ReportExtendedMetadata

methods.name: getAggregateColumnInfo
methods.description: Returns all report summaries such as Record Count, Sum, Average, Max, Min, and custom summary formulas. Contains values for each summary that is listed in the report metadata.

methods.name: getDetailColumnInfo
methods.description: Returns a map of two properties for each field that has detailed data identified by its unique API name. The detailed data fields are also listed in the report metadata.

methods.name: getGroupingColumnInfo
methods.description: Returns a map of each row or column grouping to its metadata. Contains values for each grouping that is identified in the groupingsDown and groupingsAcross lists.

description: Contains report extended metadata for a tabular, summary, or matrix report.
